member.name: APC_CALLBACK_DATA
member.summary: Specifies the data for a user-mode asynchronous procedure call (APC) object.

member.name: APC_CALLBACK_DATA.Parameter
member.summary: The data passed to the function using the dwData parameter of the function.

member.name: APC_CALLBACK_DATA.ContextRecord
member.summary: The processor context that was interrupted when the thread was directed to call the APC function.

member.name: APC_CALLBACK_DATA.Reserved0
member.summary: Reserved for future use; must be zero.

member.name: APC_CALLBACK_DATA.Reserved1
member.summary: Reserved for future use; must be zero.
